# Steps to setup Rproject

1. **Open Rstudio**  
   In the menu, `File` -> `New project...`
   
![Create New project](figure\fig_1.png)
   

2. **Choose Existing Directory**.

![Existing Directory](figure\fig_2.png)


3. **Create project at prefered directory**  
   - Click `Browse` and select your project directory
   - Then click `Create project`
   
![Select the directory](figure\fig_3.png)

4. **Check your Rproject**  
   - Your Rproject will be at your directory
   
![Rproject](figure\fig_4.png)
